General.name: Dr. Vasundra Tour√©
General.summary: French-born, Indian-origin scientist passionate about FAIR data and advancing standards to enhance data-driven research.

work.name: SIB Swiss Institute of Bioinformatics
work.summary: Driving the implementation of FAIR health and related data in the Swiss Personalized Health Network (SPHN) initiative.

work.name: Norwegian University of Science and Technology
work.summary: Implementation of the FAIR principles to standardize causal interactions in Systems Biology (Druglogics project).

work.name: University of Rostock
work.summary: Support and promotion of the Systems Biology Graphical Notation (SBGN) standard in Systems Biology, in the context of the SBGN-ED+ project.

education.institution: Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU)

awards.title: SIB Remarkable Output
awards.summary: Training on 'FAIR principles in practice for health data'.

awards.title: Paid Short-Term Scientific Mission
awards.summary: Ontology unification for a better annotation of causal relationships, conducted at the Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory.

awards.title: NORBIS International Exchange Program
awards.summary: Integration of Knowledge Management and Logical Modeling: new approaches towards Systems Medicine, conducted at Institut Curie and ENS Paris for a 6 months research stay. Experience outcome.
